snippet.title: Alias Underground: Mission 1 Turkish Embassy
snippet.description:
Alias Underground: Mission 1 Turkish Embassy
Sydney Bristow must infiltrate the Turkish Embassy and steal a document.  There are multiple objectives to complete to accomplish the goal.

There is always an alternate objective to steal a Rambaldi device.  In this level, it is accomplished by finding and flipping four Rambaldi levers.  One of those levers are shown in the safe with the document to steal.  The other three are hidden throughout the level.  

Part of the joy of this game is figuring out and solving the different puzzles.  I have no intention of stealing that joy from you when you play this game.  

This was a free, no cost, downloadable game from the ABC TV website circa 2002.  It is no longer on that website.  I have recently discovered an old CD with backed up data on it with most of these levels.  

The game corresponds to specific episodes of the ABC TV show "Alias".

Feel free to download the episodes I have for the game from my Google Drive.    https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ZsMuloYpItiT1msZca4N-1DAj_5ELS8y?usp=sharing
